#id=1
#text=I always wear my hair very long , but it needed trimmed because I had some split ends .
#id=2
#text=I went to my favorite hairdresser , Michael .
#id=3
#text=He works in a very nice salon .
#id=4
#text=We 're friends , so he gave me a hug when he saw me come in .
#id=5
#text=I was seated in the chair and had an apron tied around my neck to keep the hair off .
#id=6
#text=First Michael shampooed my hair , and blew it dry .
#id=7
#text=Then , he brushed and combed it out thoroughly .
#id=8
#text=It was relaxing and enjoyable to have Michael 's skilled hands working with my hair .
#id=9
#text=He is the only hairdresser I 'll go to .
#text=before long , it was time for the actual cutting of my hair .
#text=he knew I wanted it left long , so he trimmed off the damaged ends and did the ends of my hair in a pleasing half-moon shape .
#text=My hair looks great and I enjoyed my time at the hairdresser 's .
